div.ab:
لفاطمة ابنت محمّد بن عيسى بن إسحق القبلي مــنزل بن أحمد الدبّاغ و البحري الشارع
لفاطمة ابنت محمّد بن عيسى في الرّكن الغربي من هــذه الدّار والشّرقي منظــرة بن
والغربي طريق المارّة اكترت ملك السّودا منزل من هذه الدار
ومن ذلك نصف منزل في الوجه القبلي من حمّام نيله حدّه القبلي

li fāṭimaẗa ĭbnati muḥammadi bni ʿīsà bni ʾisḥāqa ăl qibliyyu manzilu *** bni ʾaḥmada ăd dabbāġi wa ăl baḥriyyu ăš šāriʿu ***
li fāṭimaẗa ĭbnati muḥammadi bni ʿīsà fī ăr rukni ăl ġarbiyyi min hāḏihi ăd dāri wa ăš šarqiyyu manẓaraẗu *** bni ***
wa ăl ġarbiyyu ṭarīqu ăl mārraẗi ĭktarat malaku ăs sawdāʾu manzil min hāḏihi ăd dāri ****
wa min ḏālika niṣfu manzil:in fī ăl waǧhi ăl qibliyyi min ḥammāmi nīlahi ḥaddu hu ăl qibliyyu ****

Belonging to Fâṭima, daughter of Muḥammad b. ʿÎsâ b. Isḥâq, the southern (boundary is formed by) the dw[ellinghouse of So and So, son of A]ḥmad, the tanner; and the northern is (formed by) the street [......
belonging to Fâṭima, daughter of Muḥammad b. ʿÎsâ, in the western corner of [th]i[s] house; and the eastern is (formed by) the manẓa[ra of So and So, son of So and So,]
and the western is (formed by) the main thoroughfare. Malak, the black, has hired a dwelling (house) appertaining to this house [ .........
and thereto appertains the half of a dwelling (house) lying in the southern part of Nile's baths, the southern boundary thereof [ ........
